DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : - diagnose malnutrition Chinese hospitalize patient four nutritional screening tool : mini-nutritional assessment - short form , subjective global assessment , malnutrition universal screen tool nutritional risk screening 2002 . - optimize usage nutritional screening tool base data-mining method .
DOC.brief_title: Malnutrition Chinese Hospitalized Patients Optimizing Usage Nutritional Screening Tools
DOC.criteria: Ages≥18 ; admit hospital≥24h receive operation 8.am next day . Patients pregnant breastfeeding , could interview provide informed consent exclude .
